TUTORIAL

This weekly course covers the most common questions videographers encounter when shooting and editing with DSLR cameras, from choosing a frame size and frame rate to understanding moirÃƒÂ©. Authors Rich Harrington and Robbie Carman will also help you understand the impacts of compression and the difference between cropped (or micro 4/3rds) and full-sized sensors in cameras, and much more. This continual FAQ guide is a handy way to find the answers to the questions that plague you the most.

Topics include:

* Mixing frame rates
* Dealing with color and detail loss from compression
* Comparing sensor sizes
* Understanding how DSLR viewfinders react when recording video
* What is aspect ratio?
* Getting the right speed of memory card
* Avoiding rolling shutter
